Launch Do you want to launch this app? This app cannot be launched Enter text here… Text copied to clipboard Copy to clipboard? Text received Received clipboard text Check for new version See source code Write something to send… Text editor Done (empty) Text stream Wi-Fi Pending transfers Stopping! Canceling job… Kill now Waiting for %s to finish before transferring this file Proceed Remove transfer? Remove Remove all Remove this device? When you remove a device, its transfers will also be removed This will remove %s from the queue Remove all? This will remove all pending transfers you see here Choose network - %s No network available New version available! Folder Organising your files Communicating Communication service Device choice provider View transaction Error Why? Check if you are allowed on %1$s \n\nDevices > %2$s > Allow to connect > (check it) Save to Press again to exit Create Create folder File already exists Folder could not be created This permission allows Presto to read and write to your device\'s storage for receiving and sharing files. Settings Select this New file This folder cannot be used Default Folder Storage Share files The directory has been saved Search Change connection File name File size File type File status Status Youtube Resume Details File explorer Create folder Choose folder Choose file You can not select the old folder Move files? You can move associated files completed and partly completed to this folder and this may take some time depending on the sizes New files have been received Show Preparing files Saving details Version Pending Running Interrupted Resumed Unknown Long ago Wi-Fi Direct Wi-Fi Bluetooth Ethernet Unknown connection Text Connections Could not connect the device. Its address may have changed. Try reconnecting to the network while Presto is open. Choosing the best connection Retry receiving Ask Permission request Storage permission Permission to read phone state Presto needs to access your device\'s serial number to create a long-term identity number, helping other devices recognize you Media directory Emulated (%s) Not enough space Save path Transaction group details Used connection Removed Copy to clipboard Presto can share files now Tap to end session ETA %s Show files Set as TrustZone device Turn TrustZone on Turn TrustZone off TrustZone TrustZone is activated on start Type new entry Download Revise the text or press again to exit Save the text or press again to exit Update Save Only one text can be shared at a time Just now The default folder is not accessible to other apps Presto needs permission to set up a hotspot Presto hotspot Connect Disconnect You can send files directly via this open network created by a nearby Presto device. Connecting to the Presto hotspot Connected devices may use your cellular data. You may want to turn it off. Skip Searching for Presto hotspot You can enable Wi-Fi to search for a Presto hotspot Enable Allow Presto to search and create hotspot Location Enable location service to see scan results and create hotspot Looking for devices over a Presto hotspot Stopping the Presto hotspot Starting the Presto hotspot Check Uncheck Preview & edit Uncheck items to remove them File root Please upgrade to a supported version, and rescan devices. @string/mesg_versionNotSupported Now communicating over the \"%s\" connection Downloading the new version Got it To select a folder, tap its icon Connect to \"%s\" in \"Wi-Fi settings\" or send files via \"%s\" inside Presto Select all Select none Preview selections Connection with \"%s\" over \"%s\" failed Presto will retry receiving interrupted transfers Please choose the connection method first Set up Location Save anyway Received size Transfer expired Save anyway? The sender does not know where the file is, but you can still save it File saved Sort by Sort order Biggest first ↑ Smallest first ↓ Name Date Size Automatically accepts incoming items when TrustZone is on Trusted devices Allow connections from this device Reset This will apply initial settings Worker service Task completed Deleting selected files Ongoing task Enable NSD Network Service Discovery improves discoverability Important notifications Low priority notifications Received %s in %s %d yr %d mth %d dy %d hr %d min %d sec Exit Queue (%d) Update received successfully and saved to your received files No files here No photos here No apps here No videos here Writings will appear here No songs in here Internal storage No result for \"%s\" The list will be refreshed whenever available Cannot access \"%s\" Mount folder Select the folder you want to access Unmount folder Cache files moved %s (%d) %s (%s) Hotspot also turns TrustZone on TrustZone will also be started accordingly Scan this code to share and connect devices Set up a hotspot so that others can connect to you Scan the QR code on the screen of the host device Scan QR code to send Toggle QR code visibility Open notification settings Notification settings Rename multiple items Rename Rename Copy here TrustZone for QR code Allow TrustZone for QR code connections Help us translate Made possible by Grid size Single row Group by Photo Default Date Album Artist Folder Home Default Files You should add devices first Add devices Connect devices Network Connect Share with other apps Set up hotspot Show QR Stop hotspot Scan this if both devices are on the same network To connect to devices, Wi-Fi should be turned on Completing The devices are not on the same network Camera permission required Add devices to transfer File No device added for this transfer Third party libraries Stops communication if there is no ongoing task Leaving the app stops the service - %1d of %2d Help development Thank you! Help development Open Pause Retry No pending transfer left. To resume interrupted files, use \'Retry receiving\' option. Your desired folder is not accessible. Files will be saved to the default folder. \n \n%s Changelog Changelog You have updated Presto, would you like to see what\'s new\? You can always find \'Changelog\' in the \'About\' section This requires internet connection Dark mode Use the dark style theme Allow Telegram channel · All transfers appear here Transfers Connections details Use known devices Scan QR Use existing networks Feedback & contact @string/butn_startHotspot @string/butn_useExistingNetwork @string/butn_scanQrCode @string/butn_useKnownDevice Sent Send text Start By adding devices, you share the same files with more devices. You will be taken back to the transfer when it is done. Downloads Documents Shortcuts Recent files Change save path Failed to receive some files Send @string/text_send Choose an option to connect to the other device. For instance, if the other device is showing a QR code, use Scan QR code option. Help setting things up? Connection wizard Have you just set things up on the other device? Do you see a QR code (barcode) on its screen? Do you want the other device to connect to this device with hotspot (tethering)? If you don\'t know what hotspot is, tap to Yes. Do you want to use your router or any Wi-Fi network that you and your friend connected to? Do you want to access your previously contacted devices? Yes No Load thumbnails Show thumbnails for files Manage devices Search Wi-Fi won\'t turn on. Turning Wi-Fi on Turn on location service first to continue Connect to a Wi-Fi network to continue Removing… May take long Help @string/butn_help Choose Fix connection @string/butn_fixConnection Never The hotspot was started externally. To use QR code, you should start it here. Shortcut Add shortcut Remove shortcut Removed Added Change Welcome Make it yours Apply theme Set up permissions Lets go! Set up your profile Can not view \"%s\" Connection test - %s Connection test %d ms Revoke PIN Apply the recommended font Use the supplied custom font Waiting Pitch Black mode Use darker colors This device needs to be set as TrustZone device on the receiver device to do this operation. Enter IP Address @string/butn_enterIpAddress Share via browser @string/butn_webShare Use \'Share on browser\' option to see transfers here! Share on browser Hide on browser Shared on browser http://%s:%d/ or Visit this link with your browser Enable web-sharing for transfers individually and visit any web-link shown below with a device that is connected to the same network. Download Presto for Android Networks you connect appear here Not an IP Address \n(like 192.168.1.2) Share as APK or link? Do you want to share PlayStore link? As APK As a link Share files with Presto! Download here: %s Download all as ZIP (single, uncompressed) VPN Server Unrecognized code Text saved Change mode QR codes will be shown as text Back to the default actions for QR codes Show as QR code @string/butn_showAsQrCode
